Articles.Content:
<p><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/f877983c4f5dc185bb3b4a0e8611b711/tumblr_inline_nhqfidzARg1rr2wit.jpg"/></p>

<p><a href="http://bit.ly/1Fdmjt4"><strong><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/4f2e2d6c09df6b6b396132af5ea32f55/tumblr_inline_nhqgnw8ZaS1rr2wit.png"/></strong></a></p>

<p><strong>CaptRobau</strong>'s <a href="http://bit.ly/1Fdmjt4"><strong>OUTER PLANETS</strong></a> mod adds Kerbalized versions of outer planets to the in-game solar system that makes it just a bit more similar to that of our own. There are no moons here, but the planets look great and present a brand new challenge to take on.</p>

<p>For info and downloads, click <a href="http://bit.ly/1Fdmjt4"><strong>HERE</strong></a>.</p>

Me and no doubt Eudea55 are honored. Get ready for some moons to go with those gas giants in the near future. Sarnus is first up and I'll post some info and screens in the OPM forum thread. For that, more info or a Kerbalstuff link, click the banner in my sig to be taken to the forum thread.
For those interested: a sneak peek of the moons in the upcoming update
